## Packages

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```

```{r read_csv}
canada <- read.csv("data/ca.csv")
```

```{r filter_columns_with_more_than_half_na}
canada <- canada %>% 
  select_if(.predicate=funs(sum(is.na(.)) <= 10007 / 2))
```
